member.name: T:lonestar.Connect
member.summary: The object for implementing an Add-in.

member.name: M:lonestar.Connect.QueryStatus(System.String,EnvDTE.vsCommandStatusTextWanted,EnvDTE.vsCommandStatus@,System.Object@)
member.summary: Implements the QueryStatus method of the IDTCommandTarget interface. This is called when the command's availability is updated
member.param: The name of the command to determine state for.
Text that is needed for the command.
The state of the command in the user interface.
Text requested by the neededText parameter.

member.name: M:lonestar.Connect.Exec(System.String,EnvDTE.vsCommandExecOption,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Implements the Exec method of the IDTCommandTarget interface. This is called when the command is invoked.
member.param: The name of the command to execute.
Describes how the command should be run.
Parameters passed from the caller to the command handler.
Parameters passed from the command handler to the caller.
Informs the caller if the command was handled or not.
